RitualOutcomeEffectDef.description: Depending on ritual quality, participants will get between {MINMOOD} and {MAXMOOD} mood for {MOODDAYS} days.

extraPredictedOutcomeDescriptions.li: The two pawns will immediately get married, provided the ritual goes well. At high quality, they may get a temporary boost to fertility.
The officiator will gain social experience.

li.label: Terrible
li.description: The {0} was terrible. The officiator bumbled and didn't follow the ceremony. It was so bad the two spouses-to-be refused to listen to them.

li.label: Boring
li.description: The {0} was boring. The officiator just went through the motions, really. At least they followed procedure, and ensured the joining of the two newlyweds.

li.label: Pleasing
li.description: The {0} was pleasing. The officiator spoke firmly yet persuasively, tying the bond of marriage firmly around the two newlyweds.

li.label: Blessed
li.description: The {0} was blessed! The officiator brought everyone into a deep trance with just their words, and when they spoke to the spouses-to-be it was as if they blessed their bond with the greatest strength!

li.label: dull performance
li.description: The performance was so dull! The performer just repeated some basic dance moves in silence and didn't interact with the audience whatsoever. I was waiting for it to end.

li.label: awkward performance
li.description: The performance was awkward. The performer's moves were clumsy and their voice stuttered. At least it feels like they sort of tried.

li.label: enjoyable performance
li.description: The perfomance was enjoyable. The performer moved smoothly, incorporating song into the rhythm of their dances. They certainly earned the adoration of their spectators.

li.label: enchanting performance
li.description: The perfomance was enchanting! The performer's body flowed with sweet allure, their voice dripping with honey. When they teased the audience, I almost fainted.
